Message:
And just like that,
the big day arrived!

The square was packed
with all sorts of folks,

And so many people,
all waiting for us
with excitement.

We’ve gotta treat them
to the best show ever—

one so great no one
will ever forget it!

I was worried Flack
might be nervous,
but she seemed fine...

I mean, how could she not?
Being on stage is so fun!

“Alright!
Break a leg, everyone!
Let’s make
the Fran Circus Troupe’s
debut performance
one for the books!”
